item.title: Compile Error (Client)
item.dc:creator: @Project_Popcorn Project Popcorn
item.description:
@Project_Popcorn wrote:

Hey Guys THIS IS A DIFFERNT ERROR WITH THE CLIENT

Gui.java:16: cannot access theme.BlackTheme bad class file: .\theme\BlackTheme.class class file has wrong version 50.0, should be 49.0 Please remove or make sure it appears in the correct subdirectory of the classpa th. import theme.BlackTheme; ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Gui.Java Code (A Bit)

[code]MetalLookAndFeel.setCurrentTheme(new BlackTheme());
JFrame.setDefaultLookAndFeelDecorated(true);
JDialog.setDefaultLookAndFeelDecorated(true);
JPopupMenu.setDefaultLightWeightPopupEnabled(false);

		//UIManager.setLookAndFeel("org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceRavenLookAndFeel");
		sign.signlink.mainapp = this; // Dangerous reference?

		frame = new JFrame(frameTitle);

		if ((new File("Sprites/icon.png")).isFile()) {
			frame.setIconImage(Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("Sprites/icon.png"));
		}
		frame.setLayout(new BorderLayout());

		frame.setResizable(false);
		frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);

		JPanel gamePanel = new JPanel();
		gamePanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
		gamePanel.add(this);
		gamePanel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(765, 503));

		JMenuBar menuBar = new JMenuBar();
		JMenuBar wutBar = new JMenuBar();

                    JButton shotMenu = new JButton("Screenshot");
                    shotMenu.setActionCommand("Screenshot");
		shotMenu.addActionListener(this);

		String[] mainButtons = new String[]
			{
				"Change Server"
			};

		wutBar.add(shotMenu);
		frame.getContentPane().add(wutBar, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
		frame.getContentPane().add(menuBar, BorderLayout.NORTH);
		frame.getContentPane().add(gamePanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
		frame.pack();
		frame.setVisible(true);
		init();
	} 
	catch (Exception e) 
	{
		e.printStackTrace();
	}
}[/code]
